channel.title: Need a favor please!
channel.description: This isnt a big favor or anything, but I need this to be done so I can updat my rune crafter of its biggest bug. I just need a picture of the rune essence uptext from you guys. Try to make the uptext against light colors or colors where you dont think SRL's uptext procedure will work. I tried with my computer, and had SOME luck with making dtm's, but I thought if I got pictures of the uptext from other peoples computer, I can make a dtm that will work all the time. If you want to help out please do so. ~jr

item.title: Need a favor please!
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

This isnt a big favor or anything, but I need this to be done so I can updat my rune crafter of its biggest bug. I just need a picture of the rune essence uptext from you guys. Try to make the uptext against light colors or colors where you dont think SRL’s uptext procedure will work. I tried with my computer, and had SOME luck with making dtm’s, but I thought if I got pictures of the uptext from other peoples computer, I can make a dtm that will work all the time. If you want to help out please do so.
~jr
